INSERT INTO member (mem_id, pwd, name, birth, phone, gender, email, userAddr, userDaddr) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{userAddr}, #{userDaddr})
insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_id, pwd, name, birth, phone, gender, email, userStnum, userAddr, userDaddr) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{userStnum}, #{userAddr}, #{userDaddr})
select: select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
